infotexts.skinwalker.info:
Notes on the Skinwalker Influenza
Symptoms: low blood pressure highly congealed blood, wounds coagulate quickly prone to fits of aggression sense of identity fading skin becomes rubber-like lapses in memory poor balance
- The strain of flu in question is likely a variant of a common influenza brought to Europa by us.
- It probably spread to a native Europan lifeform like a crawler or a spineling and mutated. The current strain makes people insane, because of course it does.
- The virus can be cured with common antibiotics, though it is a tough bugger to kill. More advanced antidotes have been made, but they are expensive.
- The strain spreads through saliva or blood alike, and because the infected seem to be aggressive towards most adult humans, the disease can spread easily.
- Because of the lowered pain reception of the infected and their almost gel-like blood, they are somewhat hard to kill.
- The skinwalkers kept in captivity are quite docile under low-light conditions.
- While the subjects of the infection are lacking in higher cognitive functions, the fucking clowns have somehow pacified some of them.
(addendum 1) reminder to ask for funds to hire some clowns for us to study how they've honked the blueskins into being passive (addendum 2) remember to rewrite this report before sending it to the higher-ups
- After incident I-025 (see Harry R's report), cut skinwalker limbs are to be stored far away from live subjects.
(addendum 3) any reports of these limbs reattaching into the main body are to be redacted (addendum 4) any reports of severed limbs attaching into other infected subjects are also to be redacted
And would somebody already invent a proper, scientific name for it already? Please and thank you. - Harry
infotexts.entitydescription.clownbooster: Makes you go faster, at great risk to yourself, for when you need to quickly escape the scene of a crime. Requires welding fuel. Use with caution.
infotexts.entitydescription.clownvisor: A strange clown mask with some kind of electrical components inside. Looking at it makes you feel funny, but also sad at the same time.
infotexts.entitydescription.zaphorn: This bike horn has a firing mechanism and space enough for a single stun dart. You could possibly surprise, distract, and stun your attacker long enough to get away.
infotexts.entitydescription.flooder: Equal parts alien technology and Honkmother magic, this "flamer" is more like a "flooder."
